attributes.action: introduce legislation to protect male infants from the cruel and medieval practice of circumcision based on religious grounds.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Other than for medical reasons, to inflict permanent, irreversible, painful and disfiguring surgery on the most private part of an infants body when he is incapable of resisting or expressing an opinion, is a simple breach of his most basic Human Rights. 

Under Human Rights, everyone is entitled to protection from injury and pain by another. Everybody is entitled to equal protection before the law. One person's human rights cannot be used to deny another person's human rights.

The choice to be circumcised (or not) should remain with that individual until that person is capable of making an informed decision.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
